game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the lost city of Zerzura.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep in the desert, filled with treasures and artifacts. The city is said to be hidden behind a series of treacherous sand dunes and deadly creatures. Your quest is to find the ancient artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a magical amulet

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city from local traders and travelers.
task.description: Visit the local market and gather as much information as possible about the lost city. Talk to traders, travelers, and anyone who might have heard rumors or legends about Zerzura.

task.objective: Navigate through the sand dunes to reach the lost city.
task.description: Use your knowledge and skills to navigate through the treacherous sand dunes. Be careful of deadly creatures and harsh weather conditions.

task.objective: Explore the lost city and find the ancient artifact.
task.description: Use your skills and equipment to explore the lost city. Avoid deadly traps and fight off any creatures that might be guarding the artifact.
